author: Lesley Waters
method: For the scones, mix the flour with the eggs and whisk. Add the milk, vanilla essence and cinnamon.  This should form a thick batter. In a griddle pan melt the butter and add the pancake mix in large spoonfuls.  The mixture should make five pancakes. Cook the pancakes for a minute on each side. Place the mango onto the hot griddle pan and cook for three minutes until golden. In a bowl mix the Greek-style yogurt and honey together. Serve the scones with the griddled mango and spoon over the yogurt mix.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz self-raising flour,  2 free-range eggs ,  25ml/1 fl oz milk,  1 tsp vanilla essence,  pinch cinnamon ,  3 tbsp butter,  ½ mango, sliced ,  100g/3½oz Greek-style yogurt,  3 tbsp honey
